abstract: Former NFL running back Lawrence Phillips, currently serving 31-year sentence for choking his girlfriend and for driving his car into three teenagers, is charged with first-degree murder in death of his cellmate at Valley State Prison in central California.
lead_paragraph: Phillips, a former N.F.L. running back, was charged with first-degree murder in the death of his cellmate at a central California prison.

headline.main: Lawrence Phillips Is Charged With Murder
headline.print_headline: Former Running Back Is Charged With Murder

snippet: Phillips, a former N.F.L. running back, was charged with first-degree murder in the death of his cellmate at a central California prison.
